title: Efficacy and safety of zoledronic acid in the treatment of osteoporosis: A meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Jianfeng Sun, Masoud Rahmati, Wenqing Xie, Guang Yang, Bingzhou Ji, Dong Keon Yon, Seung Won Lee, Razak M. Gyasi, Guillermo F. López Sánchez, Pinar Soysal, Ai Koyanagi, Lee Smith, Jae Il Shin, Yusheng Li
